mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents_stock(contents_num, admin_num, cate_id, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(contents_stock_seq.nextval, #{admin_num}, #{cate_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT contents_num, admin_num, cate_id, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM contents_stock ORDER BY contents_num DESC
SELECT contents_num, admin_num, cate_id, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM contents_stock WHERE cate_id = #{cate_id} ORDER BY contents_num DESC

SELECT contents_num, admin_num, cate_id, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM contents_stock WHERE contents_num = #{contents_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE contents_stock SET map=#{map} WHERE contents_num=#{contents_num}
UPDATE contents_stock SET youtube=#{youtube} WHERE contents_num=#{contents_num}
